summary: Hello everyone! I’m not really good at making promotion posts, but I’ve decided to make an LGBT+ positive Moomin server for...
caption:
Hello everyone!

I’m not really good at making promotion posts, but I’ve decided to make an LGBT+ positive Moomin server for folks (like me) who would like more folks to connect with about Moomin! It doesn’t matter if you’ve been a fan for years or are just recently getting into it, what matters is that we have fun!

If you’re interested in joining, click here!

reblog.comment:

I’m not really good at making promotion posts, but I’ve decided to make an LGBT+ positive Moomin server for folks (like me) who would like more folks to connect with about Moomin! It doesn’t matter if you’ve been a fan for years or are just recently getting into it, what matters is that we have fun!

If you’re interested in joining, click here!

I’m not really good at making promotion posts, but I’ve decided to make an LGBT+ positive Moomin server for folks (like me) who would like more folks to connect with about Moomin! It doesn’t matter if you’ve been a fan for years or are just recently getting into it, what matters is that we have fun!

If you’re interested in joining, click here!

anyone who rocks up to moomin valley: *rocks up*
mamma and pappa moomin: we're having a kid
person who just rocked up: oh...
body:
anyone who rocks up to moomin valley: *rocks up*
mamma and pappa moomin: we're having a kid
person who just rocked up: oh cool
mamma and pappa moomin: *slam down a wad of adoption papers*
mamma and pappa moomin: it's you

summary: gif of the dancing scene from my moomin animatic . I was going to just make a seamless loop of the second half of them dancing...
caption: gif of the dancing scene from my moomin animatic . I was going to just make a seamless loop of the second half of them dancing until I realized I would have to make more drawings of them turning back in the other direction… orz …so this is it for now haha

tags: ive been watching it lately and its been giving me feelings
summary: Something about the 90s moomin japanese opening is so sad and bittersweet and nostalgic.  The tune really does get stuck in your...
body: Something about the 90s moomin japanese opening is so sad and bittersweet and nostalgic. The tune really does get stuck in your head and it’s slow and gentle which perfectly describes the show. Something about it just envokes feelings of days gone by.

reblog.comment: Something about the 90s moomin japanese opening is so sad and bittersweet and nostalgic. The tune really does get stuck in your head and it’s slow and gentle which perfectly describes the show. Something about it just envokes feelings of days gone by.

trail.content_raw: Something about the 90s moomin japanese opening is so sad and bittersweet and nostalgic. The tune really does get stuck in your head and it’s slow and gentle which perfectly describes the show. Something about it just envokes feelings of days gone by.
trail.content: Something about the 90s moomin japanese opening is so sad and bittersweet and nostalgic. The tune really does get stuck in your head and it’s slow and gentle which perfectly describes the show. Something about it just envokes feelings of days gone by.

blog.name: piedrawsthings
blog.title: local gremlin artist
blog.description:
Hello!! I'm a bi disabled autistic college student who loves to draw. I try to draw every day, but I apologize if I'm not very active. Requests are closed, but commissions are open. I love to get asks, and you're always welcome to ask me anything.                My discord server invite link: 
https://discord.gg/9jq6dxe .                                 If you need something trigger tagged please tell me!!
Please check out my Patreon to see full resolution images of my art, speedpaints, wip updates, and more! Tiers start at $1/month which includes all my sketches and wips, exclusive discord channel access where i post live updates on what I'm drawing, and more!
   https://www.patreon.com/Piefanart
My etsy shop: https://www.etsy.com/shop/PieFanart.  
http://Mcefi.xyz
❤💙❤
